name: CowARD Space Police
description:
2-4 Players Local Competitive Card Game.

A SPACE MONSTER has invaded the Space Police Department. Time to remember the only thing you've learned at space police school: Better be a living coward than a dead hero.

So better be quiet. Run away from the monster. Play Cards. Be a real coward.

Developed during https://www.jamisland.net/ GameJam.

  • Johannes Jöbstl
  • Konstantin Wilke
  • Oliver Moholi
  • Judith Wieser
  • Renate Hausenblas
  • Rene Baumgartner
